Discussions.Discussion_Name: START OF THE SEMINAR (UPDATED) AND DATES

Messages.Author: Gyöngyver Györffy
Messages.Content: Dear Students, the course will start on Monday, 29 April, 4 p.m. - 8 p.m. and will be online. The link for the seminar will be posted here on ISIS in advance. The following sessions will be: 21 May (Tuesday), in presence @ A 052, 4 p.m. - 8 p.m. 22 may (Wednesday), in presence, A 052, 4 p.m. - 8 p.m. 25 May (Saturday), in presence @ A 052, 2 p.m. - 6 p.m. 27 May (Monday), in presence @ A 201a, 9 a.m. -1 p.m. 28 May (Tuesday), in presence @ A 052, 4 p.m. - 8 p.m. 29 May (Wednesday), in presence @ A 052, 4 p.m. - 8 p.m.

Messages.Author: Gyöngyver Györffy
Messages.Content: Dear Students, please find attached the Zoom-Link for the first seminar on the 29th April, 4 p.m.  https://us05web.zoom.us/j/83194821039?pwd=zuktdCOPAqYdHIlRSkXNEyt1Tdn78V.1  Meeting ID: 831 9482 1039 Passcode: 5hu32n

Messages.Author: Jörg Gleiter
Messages.Content: Dear students, this seminar will start next week as announced. We will communicate the  link for the online session later this week. Best regards Joerg Gleiter
